<h3 id="X13944">X(13944)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 4th TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND 1st AURIGA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -((b+2*a+c)*K-a^2*(c-a+b)*(a+b+c))*S+K*(a+b+c)*a^2  :  :  , where K=4*S*sqrt(R*(4*R+r))<p>X(13944) lies on these lines: {6,13890}, {55,13945}, {372,8196}, {486,9834}, {615,5599}, {1125,13891}, {3069,5597}, {5598,13959}, {5600,7968}, {5601,13941}, {8186,13942}, {8190,13943}, {8197,13947}, {8198,13949}, {8199,13950}, {8200,13951}, {11207,13847}, {11252,13966}, {11366,13936}, {11384,13937}, {11492,13940}, {11822,13935}, {11837,13938}, {11843,13939}, {11861,13946}, {11865,13952}, {11867,13953}, {11869,13954}, {11871,13955}, {11873,13958}, {11875,13961}, {11877,13962}, {11879,13963}, {11881,13964}, {11883,13965}, {12345,13968}, {12452,13972}, {12454,13973}, {12456,13974}, {12458,13975}, {12460,13976}, {12462,13977}, {12474,13983}, {12476,13984}, {13176,13989}, {13208,13990}, {13228,13991}</p>
